SEARCH

Class MPOVoting

java.lang.Object
Voting
MPOVoting
public class MPOVoting extends Voting
MPOVoting class represents the Multiple Preferential Ordering voting system. It extends the Voting class and implements the functionality specific to the MPO voting protocol.

    • MPOVoting

      public MPOVoting(String candidateLine, ArrayList<String> ballotList, int numSeats, String auditFilePath)
      Constructor for MPOVoting class.
      Parameters:
      candidateLine - The line containing Candidate name and party affiliation information.
      ballotList - List of ballot strings.
      numSeats - Number of seats to be allocated.
      auditFilePath - Path to the audit file.

  • Method Details

    • performSeatAllocations

      public void performSeatAllocations()
      Perform the seat allocation process using the MPO voting protocol.

    • handleTie

      protected void handleTie(int candidatePosition, int numVotes)
      Handles tie-breaking for candidates with the same number of votes. Retrieves candidates currently tied with the same number of votes and who haven't been assigned any seats yet. Performs seat allocations until no seats are left or no tied candidates are left to assign seats to.
      Parameters:
      candidatePosition - The position of the candidate in the sorted list.
      numVotes - The number of votes the tied candidates have.

    • writeToAuditFile

      protected void writeToAuditFile(StringBuilder sb)
      This function write StringBuilder content to the audit file. This function is helpful for writing party, candidate, rounds of seat allocation, and tie information to the audit file.
      Overrides:
      writeToAuditFile in class Voting
      Parameters:
      sb - StringBuilder object containing the content to be written to the audit file.
